### 1.1  The basic safety principle – “no‑observable‑adverse‑effect level” (NOAEL)  

All major RF‑exposure guidelines (ICNIRP 2020, FCC 2022, IEEE C95.1‑2020, etc.) start from the **only biologically proven mechanism** by which non‑ionising radio‑frequency fields can harm human tissue: **heating** (also called the *thermal effect*).
